Even though I evacuated, the rest of my family didn't! I'm safe but how can I sleep and be calm when my family is out there in that storm! My brother and his family already lost their home and cars. I may not have a home to come back to either but all I want is for God to protect my family!! This is my uncle and my mom's current situation, and the water is steadily Fising!I'm glad my baby sister was able to leave! Thank you Robert for going to rescue her!!!! Y'all family and other families in your

What?? I thought I was preparing for blackouts during the storm!!! Have you been out today? Its mental No but nothing shocks me anymore... we have a generator and our own well, so we will have power and water. Oh and lots of wine!!!
DEP Many of you have been out purchasing storm supplies. We wanted to let you know the content of these bottles is not water. We're sure water is what you're really looking for. Shop wisely.

Oh.a sorry. I've been thinking about you guys. What's the latest? Let us know if we can do anything! , and - I'm so Hoping you are all safe. It's not looking good over there! Hope you guys are all ok.
Hope you have plenty of grog No need to worry Watching the news and Trump is about to arrive so you'll be fine And on a serious note hope you and your friends/ neighbours are all ok!! 血
We are at the fire station at Kingsland and Mason. We can put you to work. Streets are passable around here Stay safe, I appreciate that you're on military time

So update from us: we're all ok and still dry for the moment but we are in the flood zone for a reservoir release they are going to do later today/tonight so we could end up with flooding in the house. The good news is we have 2 floors in our house and have managed to relocate most of our belongings upstairs which should remain dry. The downside is if we do end up flooded then we could have water in the house for up to a few months - fecking disaster! So keep us in your thoughts, we've got another few days to get through. We've prepped for the worst and

Wish I could help you all out. Be safe guys I have a 4 person raft and a two person inflatable kayak. We can head your way.. But we are in a small compact car. Will it be safe to drive there? We can't afford to lose this vehicle We want to help, but we

Katy, in search of double kayak, 2+ person raft, or other large watercraft capable of shallow depth crossing and hauling 2+ people and gear. Will be mobilizing off of Mason just South of Westheimer at 20:00, evacuating more people from behind

have done for us all. Hugs your loved ones closer tonight peeps and be thankful for everything vou have. have no words but had to reach out to you both. An unimaginable experience but so glad you are all together and finally safe. Sending you and the little

We have evacuated our house and are safe with kiddos and dogs at a friends place. No idea when or even if we will be able to return home so having been through the worst 5 days imaginable, we now need to figure out how to carry on with 1 set of clothes each and a little more for the kiddos. The reality of the situation is just horrible and to think we are some of the lucky ones! Biggest thanks to and for being our saviours today, we will never be able to thank you enough for what you have done for us all. Huas vour

I saw this on the news tonight. These ladies helped my friends get to a safe place Where able to pick them up. Hats off to this group! #CajunNavy #HoustonStrong #KatyTx and i were int 89%. 10:33 Its been a roller coaster few days and th road ahead is going to be tough and very long. So grateful for what Lisa Ann Campos and Jenn Cothern are doing for us, plus the willingness and comfort that responding to a request to help in the

#HoustonStrong #KatyTx Its been a roller coaster few days and th road ahead is going to be tough and very long. So grateful for what Lisa Ann Campos and Jenn Cothern are doing for us, plus the willingness and comfort that responding to a request to help in the early hours provides Calum Neff & Elizabeth Dains, Long live the #CajunNavy and all who've volunteered from far and wide to help. Your selflessness is overwhelming. For friends back home, im Sure you are seeing images, but the TV or pictures wil never capture the scale of what this state is facing. You never think the person on theTwill be you. It broke our hearts to have to tell our AJUN NAVY ASSISTING IN NUMEROUS kids that we had leave our house because of the water on a boat this morning; but when the response back is "Are we going on a disney cruise today?", it's quickly mended. ESCUES THROUGHOUT HOUSTON AREA

Right now rescue did by Coastal Guard is rather slow. A neighbor of mine told me that 5:00 am yesterday the water was poured into one of his friends' home. They called for help through phone and were rescued by Coastal Guard at 3:00 pm. His friend's family lived in a house with only one floor. The family seated on the table to wait for rescue, because the water line was up to 18-feet. Brother, how is your house now? how is your house? The streets are filled with water. And the water is flowing to the grass. :how is your house? Is everyone safe now? Please remember to say you are fine.

What's the situation of the family that would like to give rescued people a place to live? Could you please share your contact and address if you still can accommodate people? You are welcome to come to my house. We are fine. My house is ready to let people come and live We are fine, too. We are preparing sandbags in case that water will flow into the house.

Houston Rescue Resources List 911. People who were rescued by helicopters said that it's necessary to keeping calling 911 until getting through. Don't give up. Once they received your call for help, they will arrange rescue United States Coast Guard SOS on your roof. Chinese Volunteer Rescue. Boats are available. If necessary, please write

The water at the first floor is up to my ankle now. The power was out 5min ago. For the next few days, we should keep focus on some basic considerations. God will tell us whether to stay home or to leave home. Contents from Bible)

My mobile phone is in power save mode. Let's keep praying. Also, thanks for every family that provided rooms for rescuees to live. The reason that we decided not to leave our house was that we have three dogs.I believe God will help us. Food and drinking water are enough. We are fine. Please save mobile phone power. I don't know how to contact you. If you need to be rescued by any transportation, please call Coast Guard at Let's keep praying. Also, you can try to contact ide roomsfor you to
The boat will arrive at within one hour. We are preparing to le A helicopter is coming to rescue neighbors

Thanks God to saving us. LZD and XFM are still at their houses in the looded area. Please leave so soon as possible. You are welcome to come to other Sisters' or Brothers' house to live until water receding. What is the height of water line? is in Brother XY's house now. We are in XH's house. Thank you! OK. Thanks God! Sisters and Brother, please leave if you can. Also...

Thank you a Thanks to torwarding the message we decide to stay home temporally. We will stay at second floor. The daughter of my neighbor is at my house. The water line is slowly rising The water line can be checked at any time at this website. The driveway is flooded, and water is flowing into garage now. We decide to stay at the second floor. The food and drinking water are enough for three to five days living. There are others four people live with us. We will cut off power tonight. Also, in order to save power, we will stop to log in WeChat. We will be back sometime. Thank you! Thank you!

No flood insurance. We need lots of prayers. Yikes!

You are more than welcome to some. Thanks, ! We are good for tonight & think we have some chicken leg quarters left for tomorrow but we may need some dry food for the next day if we're all still here. Praying for you guys! 西卬。

Praying for you guys! Y'all doing ok? house is starting to flood. It's up to the house n the front Oh no! I hate to hear that. I thought she would be ok. Is she with you? yeah we got her to our house. Hers has about 3-4 inches rn. good to know she's safe. Have y'all heard anything about MawMaw & her house? I have not. Hoping they r high enough

Cracked open my bottle of Merlot. Nothing to do now but wait. Love seeing that. Stay safe Just opened my first hard cider today. It is not too funny that each day, my drink comes earlier and earlier. Sending prayers your way. Yeah, I can already tell I should have gotten a bigger bottle.

Yes, most of my cider is gone. I am trying to decide if I move to another drink (we have some hard liquor in the cabinet) or if I just stick to water. I don't want to really drink, just take the edge off. Sounds good I love your boots! Praying ya'll continue to be safe We are the same. Many cocktails in a short period of time. Good for you Kim!
